DOC.brief_title: Dose Range Finding Study MK-0941 Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Insulin ( MK-0941-007 AM3 EXT1 AM1 ) ( TERMINATED )
DOC.detailed_description: This study 54-week randomize , double-blind base study optional 104-week extension study ( MK-0941-007-11 ) . Beginning Week 16 , participant randomize maximum dose MK-0941 could up-titrate MK-0941 40 mg three time daily . Participants complete 54-week base study eligible enter extension study remain treatment group assign base study .
